Introducing: WhatsApp Translator 🌐✨

1. Beautiful Interface 🎨 – Enjoy a sleek and user-friendly design.
2. 100% Free 💯 – Unlimited access to all features without restrictions.

How to get started?

2. Pin the Install the Extension
3. Open WhatsApp Web
